漢羅台文: 民間團體「催生臺語公共電視台」得著文化部撥六千萬經費
台羅: bîn-kan thuân-thé “tshui-sing Tâi-gí kong-kiōng tiān-sī-tâi” tit-tio̍h bûn-huà-pōo puah la̍k-tshing-bān king-huì
台羅數字調: bin5-kan1 thuan5-the2“tshui1-sing1 tai5-gi2 kong1-kiong7 tian7-si7-tai5”tit4-tioh8 bun5-hua3-poo7 puah4 lak8-tshing1-ban7 king1-hui3
白話字: bîn-kan thoân-thé“chhui-seng Tâi-gí kong-kiōng tiān-sī-tâi”tit-tio̍h bûn-hòa-pō͘ poah la̍k-chheng-bān keng-hùi
